title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.13.0.1 发布
author: zyjking
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zyjking 于 2019-6-28 23:17 编辑 

测试版是Minecraft基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器与测试版不兼容。
如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。
Minecraft 基岩版 1.13 仍未发布，1.13.0.1为其第1个测试版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

Experimental Gameplay:
实验性玩法：
(Work in progress features that are only available when Experimental Gameplay is enabled in world settings)（仅在世界选项中开启实验性特性开关时可用）New and improved Structure Blocks!新增和改进结构方块！

New Features:
新特性：
Added the Fox!添加了狐狸！
Added the arctic Fox as a variant添加北极狐作为狐狸变种Foxes now spawn as arctic variants when in snowy climates, and polar bears will attack them unprovoked北极狐会在下雪时生成，北极熊会直接向它们发起攻击Trusted Foxes defend trusted players信任玩家的狐狸会保护被信任的玩家Foxes can pick up and carry items in their mouths狐狸会叼起和拿着物品在它们嘴上Foxes may eat what they are carrying, sometimes with interesting results!狐狸有时可能会把嘴上的物品给吃了，或许会伴有有趣的结果！
Coordinates can now be tab-completed when writing commands写命令的时候可以用tab进行补全Added new “PersistComponent” for mob persistence为怪物耐久新增“persist”组件Added new and improved Structure Blocks新增和改进结构方块
Save and Load features are behind the Experimental Toggle保存和载入功能需要开启实验性玩法后才可用

Changes:
更改：
Added a message that informs players whether a Marketplace pack is compatible with their version of Minecraft (specifically if it includes blocks from a newer version of the game)增加一条消息，用来通知玩家他们的市场包是否兼容他们的Minecraft版本（特别是如果它包含来自新版本的方块的话）Minecraft on iOS will no longer show the "Do you want to Close Minecraft" pop-up since iOS doesn't support that app behaviouriOS上的Minecraft将不再弹出“是否关闭Minecraft”的窗口，因为iOS不支持这种应用程序的行为Added chat settings options to improve accessibility新增聊天设置选项，改进辅助功能的使用

For Map Makers and Add-On Creators:
给地图和附加包制作者：
New Data Driven Items新的数据驱动项

Added shake animation to data-driven arrow (MCPE-40744)为箭矢新增摇摆动画数据驱动Data driven actor push logic and behaviour数据驱动现在可以参与并推动（？）逻辑和行为Breaking item particles are now data driven破坏物品粒子现在属于数据驱动Implemented data driven environment damage数据驱动可以实现环境破坏Data driven sparkler particles添加数据驱动烟火粒子Data driven Guardian/Elder Guardian animation and rendering对于守卫者/远古守卫者数据驱动的动画和渲染
Fixed unparented geometry on pre 1.8 guardians修复了1.8之前守卫者形状非父级的问题Elder Guardian Spike animation远古守卫者攻击动画现在属于数据驱动
Added new feature rules data that implements existing biome decoration through json新增对现有生物群系装饰的数据规则特性，通过json实现
Final infrastructure changes required to support fully data driven features. Rules themselves must be provided in a behaviour pack with experimental turned on最后的基本更改需要依赖所有数据驱动的特性来实现，它们的规则需要行为包提供，以及必须启用实验性玩法
Converted the Fishing Hook actor to be Data-Driven将钓鱼鱼钩动画转换为数据驱动Converted the Balloon actor to be Data-Driven将气泡粒子转换为数据驱动Data Driven Player Rendering数据驱动会渲染玩家Snow Golem trail behaviour is now data driven雪傀儡移动并产雪的行为现在属于数据驱动Horse models/animations are now data driven马的模型/行为现在属于数据驱动User Story Dragon Breath Particles are now data driven玩家走进龙息时的粒子现在属于数据驱动Ores are now data driven (OreFeature)原矿现在属于数据驱动（矿石特性）
Added Scripting Documentation for ActorDamageSource为ActorDamageSource新增脚本文档Added additional Scripting information to death events为死亡事件新增额外的脚本信息Added block container Scripting component为脚本组件新增方块容器Added 'Projectile Hit' Scripting event新增Projectile Hit脚本事件Added 'Actor Hurt' Scripting event新增Actor Hurt脚本事件Added new Actor tags to the Scripting API为脚本API新增新的参与标记标签Added Block Destruction Scripting event for Explosions为爆炸 新增 方块被摧毁 的脚本事件Actor Definition Events can now be triggered from scripts脚本现在可以触发并参与已被定义的事件Added 'actor_sneak' Scripting event新增actor_sneak脚本事件Added 'actor attacked' Scripting event新增actor_attacked脚本事件Levers now have their own block state拉杆现在有了属于自己的方块属性Fixed a scripting error that would show when shooting arrows from a dispenser修复了在发射器里射箭时可能导致的脚本显示错误的bugAdded 'build document' code for data-driven recipes在数据驱动合成表里新增“build document”代码Players can now open and view scripting logs while the game is running玩家可以在游戏运行时打开并查看脚本日志All pillar blocks now have their own block state instead of using some values of the direction block state. This allows mirror and rotating with structure blocks所有竖纹方块现在都有自己的方块属性，方块会利用一些值决定方块朝向状态。这可以和结构方块一起设置镜像反转和旋转朝向

bug修复：
修复了125个bug
